table.searchTemplate: sourcetype="SharepointAuditLogger" Event="Delete" | stats dc(ItemName) by UserName, _time,ItemName| table _time,ItemName, UserName
table.title: Disposed Objects

table.searchTemplate: sourcetype="SharepointAuditLogger" Event="Update" | eval time=strftime(_time, "%d/%m/%y %H:%M:%S") | stats earliest(time) as start by ItemName
table.title: New Objects
